import React from "react"; function About() { const frontEndSkills = [ "HTML5", "CSS3 (including SASS/SCSS)", "JavaScript (ES6+)", "React.js (Advanced)", "Angular (Intermediate)", "Vue.js (Intermediate)", "Responsive Web Design", "Web Performance Optimization", ]; const uiUxSkills = [ "Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, XD)", "Figma (Advanced)", "Sketch", "InVision", "User Research and Prototyping", "Wireframing and Mockups", ]; const additionalSkills = [ "Version Control (Git)", "Responsive Web Design", "Cross-Browser Compatibility", "Web Accessibility (WCAG)", "SEO Best Practices", "Agile Development Methodologies", ]; return ( <>

My Tech Stack

Front-End Development

    {frontEndSkills.map((skill, index) => (
  • {skill}
    • ))}

UI/UX Design Tools

    {uiUxSkills.map((skill, index) => (
  • {skill}
    • ))}

Additional Skills

    {additionalSkills.map((skill, index) => (
  • {skill}
    • ))}

I specialize in creating intuitive user interfaces and seamless user experiences, with a focus on responsive design and modern web technologies.

); } export default About;
